remarks: Restricted "at most one" using implicit substitution.  (Contributed by NM, 24-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 11-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Mar-2017.)  (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Oct-2017.)
statement:
rmo4f.1 $e |- F/_ x A $.
rmo4f.2 $e |- F/_ y A $.
rmo4f.3 $e |- F/ x ps $.
rmo4f.4 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
rmo4f $p |- ( E* x e. A ph <-> A. x e. A A. y e. A ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> x = y ) ) $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
